_comment: Sample GloBI dataset descriptor. See http://github.com/globalbioticinteractions for more information.
citation: Sarah E Miller. 9/6/2015. Species associations manually extracted from Obame-Nkoghe, J., Rahola, N., Bourgarel, M., Yangari, P., Prugnolle, F., Maganga, G.D., Leroy, E.M., Fontenille, D., Ayala, D. and Paupy, C., 2016.
